scripts.deploy:manual: npm run build && powershell -Command "$target = 'C:\Users\user\Documents\GitHub\vikmil.github.io\vj-vikmil\ascii-detect'; if (Test-Path $target) { Remove-Item $target -Recurse -Force }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $target -Force | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path 'dist\*' -Destination $target -Recurse -Force"
